title: How to Make a Masking Tape Hair Bow

steps.headline: Choose how big you want your bow to be, & make a sheet of masking tape twice as big as chosen size (i.e if you want a 2 in x 4 in bow, make a 4 in x 8 in sheet of tape).
steps.description: (To make a sheet of masking tape, rip strips of tape slightly longer than your longest dimension & place sticky side up on your work surface. overlap the edges of more strips until you reach your desired size.)

steps.headline: Fold your sheet of tape "hotdog style", trying to line up the edges as best you can.
steps.description: It's okay if it's not perfect.

steps.headline: Fold the sheet "hamburger style" to create a crease in the middle of the bow.
On/near the crease, fold accordion style.
Also fold accordion style at each skinny end of the sheet.
Fold one of the accordion-folded ends towards the accordion-folded middle & secure with more tape.
Do the same to the other side.
Take your bobby pin & choose which side of your bow will be the backside.
Secure with more tape, or if you want it to be stronger, hot glue.
Wear it in your hair, or give it to a friend.

text: Choose how big you want your bow to be, & make a sheet of masking tape twice as big as chosen size (i.e if you want a 2 in x 4 in bow, make a 4 in x 8 in sheet of tape). (To make a sheet of masking tape, rip strips of tape slightly longer than your longest dimension & place sticky side up on your work surface. overlap the edges of more strips until you reach your desired size.) Fold your sheet of tape "hotdog style", trying to line up the edges as best you can. It's okay if it's not perfect. Trim the raggedy edges.  Fold the sheet "hamburger style" to create a crease in the middle of the bow.  On/near the crease, fold accordion style.  Also fold accordion style at each skinny end of the sheet.  Fold one of the accordion-folded ends towards the accordion-folded middle & secure with more tape.  Do the same to the other side.  Take your bobby pin & choose which side of your bow will be the backside.  Secure with more tape, or if you want it to be stronger, hot glue.  Decorate your bow! It looks good plain, too. Wear it in your hair, or give it to a friend.
